short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts Your Photos into 3D Anaglyphs, which can be viewed with (eg. red/cyan) filtered glasses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert Your Images (png/jpeg) to 3D, applying an Anaglyph Filter and using a Special Algorithm. 
CONVERT FROM A SINGLE IMAGE - NO SEPARATE LEFT AND RIGHT PHOTO REQUIRED.
It is simple to use, EASY AND FUN.

Filter Options:
(red/cyan)
(red/blue)
(magenta/green)
(magenta/cyan)  

This Version is FREE, as it is supported by advertisements. Thank You for Your Understanding.

Like the App?  support the developer by giving a G+1
